version_notes: Exercise for Green DataScience.Data extracted from 2019 EMEP (www.emep.int) dataset EMEP01_rv4.42_year.2019met_2019emis.ncwith 0.1 degrees resolution (approx 11.1 km) - Dry and wet deposition of oxidized and reduced N(DDEP_OXN_m2Grid + DDEP_RDN_m2Grid + WDEP_OXN + WDEP_RDN) converted from mgN m-2 to kg ha-1
